text.autoconfig.firstperson.title: FirstPerson Settings
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.xOffs: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.sneak: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sneaking
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.impro: Tries to fix offset issues with mods like Immersive Portals Mirrors
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.enabl: The default state of the FirstPerson mod after starting the game
